movie.management.web.service

类 MovieService

  • java.lang.Object
    • movie.management.web.service.MovieService

  • public class MovieService
extends Object
    Service class for managing movies and actors. Provides functionality to add movies and actors, link them, and retrieve information about them.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      MovieService() 

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 具体方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Actor addActor(Actor actor)
      Adds a new actor to the collection.
      Movie addMovie(Movie movie)
      Adds a new movie to the collection.
      Movie getMovieByTitle(String title)
      Retrieves a movie by its title.
      Map<Integer,Movie> getMovies()
      Retrieves all movies.
      List<Movie> getMoviesByActorName(String name)
      Retrieves movies that a given actor has been linked to.
      String linkMovieToActor(Integer movieId, Integer actorId)
      Links a movie to an actor by their IDs.
      void setMovies(Map<Integer,Movie> movies)
      Sets the movie collection to a new map of movies.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • MovieService

        public MovieService()

    • 方法详细资料

      • addMovie

        public Movie addMovie(Movie movie)
        Adds a new movie to the collection. If the movie already exists, returns the existing one instead of adding a duplicate.
        参数:
        movie - The movie to add.
        返回:
        The added or existing movie.

      • addActor

        public Actor addActor(Actor actor)
        Adds a new actor to the collection. If the actor already exists, returns the existing one instead of adding a duplicate.
        参数:
        actor - The actor to add.
        返回:
        The added or existing actor.

      • linkMovieToActor

        public String linkMovieToActor(Integer movieId,
                               Integer actorId)
        Links a movie to an actor by their IDs. Prevents duplicate links.
        参数:
        movieId - The ID of the movie.
        actorId - The ID of the actor.
        返回:
        A message indicating success or failure of the operation.

      • getMovieByTitle

        public Movie getMovieByTitle(String title)
        Retrieves a movie by its title.
        参数:
        title - The title of the movie.
        返回:
        The movie if found, null otherwise.

      • getMoviesByActorName

        public List<Movie> getMoviesByActorName(String name)
        Retrieves movies that a given actor has been linked to.
        参数:
        name - The name of the actor.
        返回:
        A list of movies associated with the actor.

      • getMovies

        public Map<Integer,Movie> getMovies()
        Retrieves all movies.
        返回:
        A map of all movies, keyed by their ID.

      • setMovies

        public void setMovies(Map<Integer,Movie> movies)
        Sets the movie collection to a new map of movies.
        参数:
        movies - A map of movies to set.
